title: Drawing, "Study: Tiger Lilies", early 20th century
medium: Pen and ink, graphite on yellow tracing paper
inscribed:
recto: S. L. Crownfield (inscribed by her sister, Gertrude) / No. 2

description: Vertical sheet depicting two stalks of tiger lilies, each with buds and one open blossom.
